column5: I finally got a chance to scoot out on my own. Brought the GoPro with me for the first time this season. What a blast! It's kind of nice being on the rod instead of the net for a change.
Great outing and great hearing from you Steve. I am looking forward to next week. Seems they are on fire.
great post ! looks like you're using a lightweight reel,and a 6 ft. rod, you make it look easy !
Awesome! Looks like you have them dialed in. Great video, thanks for posting.
Nice video, might give it a try friday, weather looks good
It,s glass out there this morning. GRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR
Gusty winds the past 2 days has kept me off the lakers. GRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR .
